backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing user profiles with access control plus public message submission and admin-only message retrieval.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing an image asset update and associated frontend file impact.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: List of pre-generated short summaries for various frontend files used in the project.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Guide describing prerequisites and steps for deploying the app locally or on the Internet Computer mainnet.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styling with extensive CSS variable definitions for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React app configuring layout and routing for home and listen pages using TanStack Router.
frontend/src/components/contact/ContactF: React contact form with validation, backend submission via actor, and success UI handling.
frontend/src/components/navigation/SiteF: Footer component with navigation shortcuts, social links, smart section scrolling, and Listen page navigation.
frontend/src/components/navigation/SiteH: Responsive header with scroll detection, navigation buttons, social links, and logic to scroll or navigate to sections/pages.
frontend/src/components/sections/AboutSe: About section displaying artist name, portrait, and bio text split into paragraphs.
frontend/src/components/sections/Biograp: Biography section showing narrative text and a milestones timeline sourced from artistContent.
frontend/src/components/sections/Contact: Contact section with a heading, description, and embedded ContactForm component.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Hero banner with background image, artist name, tagline, and buttons that scroll to shows or contact sections.
frontend/src/components/sections/MusicSe: Music section listing tracks with external Spotify links and CTAs for the listen page and full discography.
frontend/src/components/sections/Section: Simple wrapper component adding an id and optional styling around section content.
frontend/src/components/sections/ShowsSe: Shows section displaying formatted upcoming and past shows with ticket links and location details.
frontend/src/components/sections/VideosS: Videos section embedding YouTube videos from artistContent and linking to the YouTube channel.
frontend/src/content/artistContent.ts: Defines artist metadata, biography, social links, and track lists for use across the site.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor instance tied to Internet Identity, refreshing queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, stored identity loading, and auth client setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Exposes a mutation hook for submitting contact messages through the backend actor and invalidates message queries on success.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind base styles, CSS variables, theming, and typography for the frontend.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app with query client and Internet Identity provider before rendering the root component.
frontend/src/pages/ListenPage.tsx: Renders a listening page with embedded track players, track metadata, and Spotify link using artist content.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters, including support for hash-based routing and session persistence.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS configuration enabling dark mode, content scanning, extended colors, fonts, animations, and custom theming.
project_state.json: Project state metadata defining current features, pending requests, and overall project configuration for adding an uploaded photo.
